mapper.update: update lian_account set agree_no = #{agreeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lian_bank_code = #{lianBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brabank_name = #{brabankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, agree_no, lian_bank_code, bank_card, province_code, city_code, brabank_name, create_time, update_time from lian_account where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select user_id, agree_no, lian_bank_code, bank_card, province_code, city_code, brabank_name, create_time, update_time from lian_account
